projects.name: Chatbot AI
details: Web application for quickly retrieve related documents
Utilized RESTful APIs for backend communication.

projects.name: Object Recognition
details: Developed an object recognition using trained YOLOv5 for real-time detection.
Implemented image segmentation techniques to isolate objects.
Developed tools for preprocessing image dataset.

projects.name: Visualization Dashboard
details: Created an interactive dashboard for data visualization.
Implemented real-time updates with Chart.js to display dynamic graphs.
Developed a Java backend to handle data processing and API communication

projects.name: ChoreCenter
details: Android application for interaction between parents and their childrens
